name: Affiliate VideoHive Widget
author: StefanPejcic

sections.description:
A simple WordPress plugin that fetches information from the Envato API and displays VideoHive items as a WordPress widget.

This is a fork of the Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget
We have just modified it to fetch the information from videohive instead of themeforest, removed sorting by item popularity, and replaced the categories to be output. All code is written by the awesome team at MeksHQ that creates the most amazing WordPress themes and if you have any issues with the functionality/compatibility of the plugin, please refer to their support page.

If you are a CodeCanyon author this widget is perfect for you.

Features

  • Using Envato official API
  • Supports all VideoHive marketplace categories
  • Select latest VideoHive items
  • Select popular VideoHive items
  • Select items from one or more specific users
  • Order items by release date, upload date, numbers of sales, price or random
  • Add your affiliate links to VideoHive items
  • Caching system integrated for better performance

This is a fork of the Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget created by MeksHQ

Envato API?

Envato API is free and can be obtained in lesss than 5 minutes from the envato.com website. This plugin requires a valid API in order to work properly.

Live example?

You can see VideoHive Smart Widget live example on our demo website

Available languages

  • English (en_US) – default
sections.installation:
1. Upload affiliate-videohive-widget.zip to plugins via WordPress admin panel or upload unzipped folder to your wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance -> Widgets to add and setup the widget
sections.faq: For any questions, issues and suggestions please visit https://wpxss.com/contact
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Compatibility with WordPress 5.6

1.0.1

  • Compatibility bug with cc widget plugin fixed

1.0

  • Initial release
